appearances.dialogue:
Don't worry about losing your face - you were never that handsome anyway. It's a good thing you lived.
				I used to serve your father, Jack the Man, in the past. I want to help you.
People of Cardia Nostra will want different things of you. Decide carefully whether or not you want to give them what they want.
I have found some cards in the attic. Take them for free, Jackie - perhaps they will be of use.
You may have noticed some things are happening overnight. Perhaps you will be able to manipulate the market to your benefit...
Please accept my card as a tribute, sir. They say mafia is not for kids like me, but I have to join it to protect my mother and sister.
T-the dons demand that I pay them, and I have no means to do so. If you could give me a rare card, you'd save my life. And I'll pay you threefold when I climb up the ranks
Ahahahahahah! I scammed you! I'm the king of mafia now, and I won't give you shit!
